configurations.name: DesignPatternAnalysis
configurations.command: python main.py --query "You are a software architect reviewing this Python codebase. Analyze: 1) Current patterns in config.py, main.py, testeur.py, and lm_studio.py 2) Pattern details including location, implementation, pros/cons 3) Three recommended new patterns with code examples 4) Testing strategy 5) Migration plan. Format in markdown."
